010-02572-11.pvName: Approach® S42, Polished Silver with White Band

seo.title: Garmin Approach® S42 | Golf Watch
seo.ogDescription: Garmin Approach® S42 is a golf watch designed for lowering your score. Features include 42,000 CourseView maps & live score when paired with Garmin Golf app.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Battery life (smartwatch mode)Up to 10 days
Watch display typeSunlight-visible, transflective memory-in-pixel (MIP)
Touchscreen
Water rating 5 ATM

General
Strap materialSilicone
Lens MaterialChemically-strengthened glass
Bezel MaterialMetal
Quick Release bands
Physical size43.4 x 43.4 x 11.7 mm
Small/Medium version fits wrists with a circumference of 106-176 mm (Silver/White and Rose Gold/Light Sand versions)
One Size versions fit wrists with a circumference of 125-202 mm (Black/Gunmetal only)
Weight1.5 oz (43 g)
Display Size1.2 in (30.4 mm) diameter
Display Resolution240 x 240 pixels
Colour display
Battery lifeSmartwatch mode: Up to 10 days
GPS mode: Up to 15 hours
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History64 MB

Clock Features
Time/date
GPS Time Sync
Automatic daylight saving time
Alarm clock
Timer
Stopwatch
Sunrise/sunset times

Health & Wellness Monitoring
Hydration Yes (in Garmin Connect™)
Women's Health Yes (in Garmin Connect™)

Sensors
GPS
Gyroscope
Accelerometer

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth® Smart
Smart Notifications
Calendar
Weather forecasts
Find My Phone
Pairs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity profiles
INDOOR RUNNINGIndoor Track Running
OUTDOOR RUNNINGRunning
Outdoor recreationGolfing
CyclingBiking, Indoor Biking

Activity Tracking Features
Step counter
Move alerts (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)
TrueUp™

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
GPS speed and distance
Auto Pause®
Auto Lap®
Touch and/or button lock

Running Features
GPS-based distance, time and pace

Golfing Features
Preloaded with 43,000 courses worldwide
Yardage to F/M/B (distance to front, middle and back of green)
Yardage to layups/doglegs
Measures shot distance (calculates exact yardage for shots from anywhere on course)Automatic
DIGITAL SCORECARD
Custom targets
Stat tracking (strokes, putts per round, greens and fairways hit)
Garmin AutoShot™
Auto CourseView updates
GREEN VIEW WITH MANUAL PIN POSITION
Hazards and course targets
Handicap scoring
TruSwing™ compatible
Round timer/odometer
Automatic club tracking compatible (requires accessory)
Pairs with Garmin Golf app
Tournament legal

ITFE_PRODUCT_PAGES_MAP_TAB_TRANSLATIONS.ITFE_PRODUCT_PAGES_MAP_TAB_HEADING: Find compatible maps for the best navigation experience. To update the maps that came with your device, you can {{link}}.
